channel.title: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day
channel.description:
Right now, starting evil king means 3 thing 1. He is not a bd king, so he will not carry the game for bd 2. He can order exe every prince/bd 3. its takes a whole day to exe him.
**My suggestion:** When you execute the starting evil king, you'll be able to execute another player this day.

item.title: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Nope. Don’t support. Evil ling should be allowed to sacrifice themselves to help out their buddies

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day

item.title: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Then aren’t you encouraging random lynches of starting king?

No because if its a good king you getting punished and only if its evil king you’ll be able to execute another player

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Damafaud:

I don’t see why Evil King should be treated differently.

Because evil king is an Extra unseen/cult member.

MM/Assasin aren’t

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day

item.title: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.source: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day

item.title: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
But that’s the point?

Evil King is still a side against majority. If you execute an MM, you don’t get a second chance to execute the suspected Assassin for example. Even if the MM has caused the BD a major disadvantage.

I don’t see why Evil King should be treated differently.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day

item.title: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
And when u killing a bd king evil benefit (cannot vote the next day) .

The point is that evil king should not waste another day when he get exed. He already managed to do enough harm without wasting a day.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day

item.title: Suggestion: Starting Evil king execution won't past the day
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
BD King is an extra vote for BD that can kill and spawns nore often than Evi King.

Evil King should give more benefit to Evil as well.

Read full topic
